title: Macarena Macarena Lyrics Kushi
stanzas: <div>Macarena Macarena Lyrics Kushi

Mac mac mac macareena,
Mac mac mac macareena,
Mac mac mac macareena,
Mac-a-reena!(2)

macareena macareena,
Whistle adikkum
nilavu thaanaa?

macareena macareena,
Rekkai mulaikkum
vayasu thaanaa?

Macareena...
O.K. thaanaa?
Ma-gaa-gaa-gaa
gaa-ree-naa...

Kangal enna kangal
Adhai kandu vilundhena pengal
Engal idhayathai thirudathae
Engal idhayathai thirudathae

Pengal endraal pookkal,
Adhai rasithida vaendum aangal
Engal manadhinai parikkadhae
Engal manadhinai parikkadhae

macareena macareena,
Whistle adikkum
nilavu thaanaa?

Macareena...
O.K. thaanaa?
Ma-gaa-gaa-gaa
gaa-ree-naa..

Mac mac mac macareena,
Mac mac mac macareena,
Mac mac mac macareena,
Mac-a-reena!(2)

Naan ninaithaal ulagin oliyai,
Oru naal mattum niruthi vaippaen.
Poovedikkum vedikkum oliyai
Oru cassettil padhivu seyvaen
Oh oh oh...

Naan ninaithaal mugilin puzhuvai
Endhan koondhalil olithu vaippaen.
Vaan malaiyin mudhalaam thuliyai
Boyfriend-ukku parisalippaen.

Nuraigalae illaiyendraal
alai illaiyae yeah yeah
Kuraigalae illaiyendraal
vayasillaiyae yeah yeah

Mac mac mac macareena,
Mac mac mac macareena,
Mac mac mac macareena,
Mac-a-reena!(2)
Mac-a-reena......

Naam oru naal paravai vadivil
Andha vaanathil vasithiruppom.
Pon nilavin veliyae irundhu
Indha bhoomiyai rasithiruppom.

Thaagam vandhu
udhadu varandaal,
Andha megathil neer kudippom.

Vinveliyil pasithaan eduthaal
Vinmeengalai kothi thinnuvom
oh oh oh

Vaanam konjam
bhoomi konjam,
Kudiyiruppomae ..

Bore adithaal
sevvai sendru,
Idam pidippomae
